TopicTitle: How to prevent ships from changing name automaticaly?

Articles.Content: Ships always change their name after docking at stations.And stations will change name too.It makes me hard to find the certain ship.What can I do to deal with it?

In the VAB and SPH you can set ‘name priority’ for each command part which will determine what the vessel as a whole is named. For station control points, set it to 20 to always keep that name when you dock more stuff to it.

Edited June 4, 2020 by jimmymcgoochie
